Comments_List: A little bit about muscle contraction, physical chemistry, and a lot about channels through various diseases.
Weakness: The physical chemistry part of the course is disorganized. Strength: The learning about channels through diseases is very interesting and is about half the course.
Yes, it is a good upper level elective.
